permissions: Authenticated users (persisted accounts) can create a public praise summary.
side_effects: Reads public praise data to generate a summary; no records are created or modified.
validation_notes: If --group-by is not set, the summary defaults to grouping by recipient. If no metrics are specified and --all-metrics is false, the default metric is public_praise_count. Group-by values must be valid summary attributes (broker, culture_value, customer, given_by, organization_broker, recipient, trucker); invalid group-by values are rejected. Filters must use valid keys (broker, customer, trucker, organization_broker, given_by, recipient, culture_value, created_at_min, created_at_max) and cannot be blank; unknown filter keys are rejected. created_at_min and created_at_max expect dates in YYYY-MM-DD format. Included metrics must be valid metric names (public_praise_count); invalid metrics are rejected. Sort fields (when provided) must reference a valid summary attribute or metric name; invalid sort values are rejected.

flags.name: --all-metrics
flags.description: Include all metrics returned by the API

flags.name: --filter
flags.validation: Each entry must be in key=value format; key cannot be blank.

flags.name: --filters
flags.validation: Must be a valid JSON object string.

flags.name: --group-by
flags.description: Group by attributes (comma-separated). Defaults to recipient unless set.
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of group-by attributes; values must be valid summary attributes.

flags.name: --metric
flags.validation: Each metric must be a valid metric name (public_praise_count).

flags.name: --metrics
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of valid metric names (public_praise_count).
